required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamics/Pharmacokinetics and Safety of LY03003 in Early PD Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamics/Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Multiple Intramuscular Doses of LY03003 in Patients With Early Parkinson's Disease

brief_summary.textblock: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamics/Pharmacokinetics and Safety of LY03003 in Early PD Patients

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From titration to dose-maintenance at day 50
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in (II + III) total score, Part II, Part III scores of the UPDRS

primary_outcome.time_frame: From titration to dose-maintenance at day 50

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From titration to dose-maintenance at day 50

intervention.description: Firstly, intramuscularly inject 14 mg of the study drug once, continue intramuscularly inject 28 mg of the study drug once after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety, continue intramuscularly inject 42 mg of the study drug once after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety, and prepare to enter the maintenance period of 56 mg dose after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety. During the dose maintenance period, 56 mg of the test drug was intramuscularly injected once a week for a total of 4 consecutive doses.

Firstly, intramuscularly inject 14 mg of the study drug once, continue intramuscularly inject 28 mg of the study drug once after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety, continue intramuscularly inject 42 mg of the study drug once after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety, and prepare to enter the maintenance period of 56 mg dose after being observed for 1 week to confirm safety. During the dose maintenance period, 56 mg of the test drug was intramuscularly injected once a week for a total of 4 consecutive doses.

facility.name: Shengjing Hospital of China Medical University
